A 75-foot long scroll-style graphic mapping of Route 66 across California developed for the Route 66 Pathway Project that highlights local art, history, infrastructure, and natural phenomena.

Like soup, this project has a general categorization in the nature of production with each piece being distinctly unique. In this series of illustrations I explore various digital production techniques.
